title: Meatball & Beer Chowdown presented by Time Out New York
desc: Join us December 6 at Houston Hall for the ultimate Sunday Funday at? Time Out New York ?s inaugural Meatball & Beer Chowdown.?Taste your way through creative takes on this hearty classic from 5 restaurants and enjoy craft brews by Greenpoint Beer Works, the brewery for Houston Hall. When purchasing tickets,?you can choose from three sessions (Noon-2pm; 2:30-4:30pm; or 5pm-7pm).?Your ticket includes 5 meatball tastings and two drink tickets that can be redeemed for any craft beer or house wine at Houston Hall.
